name: Affine
description:
A privacy-focused, local-first, open-source, and ready-to-use alternative for Notion & Miro. One hyper-fused platform for wildly creative minds.

To Shape, not to adapt. Tools can impact your lifestyle. AFFiNE is built for individual & teams who care their data, who refuse vendor lock-in, and who want to have control over their essential tools.

üõ†Ô∏è SET-UP INSTRUCTIONS
In order to save your data, you need to sign in to your self-hosted Affine instance:

1. When you first open Affine, it will walk you through setting up an admin account.
2. After setting up your admin account, close the browser window and open up the Affine app again from the umbrelOS homescreen.
3. In the Affine app select the Demo Workspace from the sidebar and then select "Create cloud workspace"
4. Follow the steps to create your self-hosted cloud workspace. You are now ready to use Affine with your self-hosted instance!

name: docuseal
description: Docuseal is an open-source electronic signature platform that allows users to sign, send, and manage documents securely online. It provides a user-friendly interface and robust features for document handling and signature workflows.

name: FossFlow
description: FossFLOW is a powerful, open-source Progressive Web App (PWA) for creating beautiful isometric diagrams. Built with React and the Isoflow (Now forked and published to NPM as fossflow) library, it runs entirely in your browser with offline support.

name: jellyfin
description:
Jellyfin is a free and open-source media server software that allows users to organize, manage, and stream their personal media collections, including movies, TV shows, music, and photos. It provides a user-friendly interface and supports a wide range of devices for seamless media playback.

üé¨ Media Organization
Jellyfin helps users organize their media libraries by automatically fetching metadata, cover art, and other relevant information for their media files. This makes it easy to browse and find content within the server.

üì° Streaming Capabilities
With Jellyfin, users can stream their media content to various devices, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, and web browsers. It supports multiple streaming protocols to ensure compatibility with different devices.

üë• Multi-User Support
Jellyfin allows multiple users to create individual profiles, each with their own watchlists, preferences, and viewing history. This feature is particularly useful for households with multiple members who want personalized media experiences.

üîí Privacy and Control
As an open-source solution, Jellyfin gives users full control over their media server without relying on third-party services. Users can host the server on their own hardware, ensuring privacy and security for their media collections.

üåê Cross-Platform Compatibility
Jellyfin is compatible with various operating systems, including Windows, macOS, Linux, and Docker. This flexibility allows users to set up their media server on a wide range of devices.

Jellyfin is an excellent choice for individuals looking for a free and customizable media server solution that prioritizes user control and privacy.

name: Linkwarden
tagline: Bookmark Preservation for Individuals and Teams
description:
üìö Linkwarden is a self-hosted, open-source collaborative bookmark manager to collect, organize and archive webpages.

üõú The objective is to organize useful webpages and articles you find across the web in one place, and since useful webpages can go away (see the inevitability of Link Rot), Linkwarden also saves a copy of each webpage as a Screenshot and PDF, ensuring accessibility even if the original content is no longer available.

üë• Additionally, Linkwarden is designed with collaboration in mind, sharing links with the public and/or allowing multiple users to work together seamlessly.

name: Mealie
description: Mealie is a self hosted recipe manager, meal planner and shopping list with a RestAPI backend and a reactive frontend built in Vue for a pleasant user experience for the whole family. Easily add recipes into your database by providing the URL and Mealie will automatically import the relevant data, or add a family recipe with the UI editor. Mealie also provides an API for interactions from 3rd party applications.

name: memos
description: Memos is a privacy-first, self-hosted knowledge base that works seamlessly for personal notes, team wikis, and knowledge management. Built with Go and React, it offers lightning-fast performance without compromising on features or usability.gallery:

name: n8n
description:
n8n is an extendable workflow automation tool. With a fair-code distribution model, n8n will always have visible source code,  be available to self-host, and allow you to add your own custom functions, logic and apps.  n8n's node-based approach makes it highly versatile, enabling you to connect anything to everything.

n8n (pronounced n-eight-n) helps you to connect any app with an API with any other, and manipulate its data with little or no code.

Customizable: highly flexible workflows and the option to build custom nodes.

Privacy-focused: self-host n8n for privacy and security.

name: open-notebook
tagline: In a world dominated by Artificial Intelligence, having the ability to think üß† and acquire new knowledge üí°, is a skill that should not be a privilege for a few, nor restricted to a single provider.
description:
Open Notebook empowers you to:
üîí Control your data - Keep your research private and secure ü§ñ Choose your AI models - Support for 16+ providers including OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama, LM Studio, and more üìö Organize multi-modal content - PDFs, videos, audio, web pages, and more üéôÔ∏è Generate professional podcasts - Advanced multi-speaker podcast generation üîç Search intelligently - Full-text and vector search across all your content üí¨ Chat with context - AI conversations powered by your research Learn more about our project at https://www.open-notebook.ai
